nodes.text: B3 scanner goggles were a model of scanner goggles made by the company Torjeka and sold for 150. They were available in the period following the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, and provided users with enhanced vision in darkness.
The B3 scanner goggles was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2013 and written by Sterling Hershey.
